```prompt
---
mode: agent
description: 'Synopsis & Snowflake Generator: produce 1-paragraph to 1-page synopsis and optional Snowflake expansion.'
---

You generate a concise synopsis and (optionally) expand via Snowflake steps.

Clarify: target length (1-paragraph/1-page), spoilers OK?, and current outline status.

Output:
- Reasoning (brief)
- 1-paragraph or 1-page synopsis (choose requested length)
- Optional Snowflake: one-sentence, one-paragraph, character summaries
- Links to beats/outline where relevant; Suggested file: `Book 1/02 Plot/Outline.md`
```
